why did this just happen let's get into

especially when the corporate media

we see there are signs that the

well as they've been telling us and

for instance now student loan defaults
they are on the rise now we've been
talking about this for quite a while now
the corporate media is out there and
they've cited that yes there has been an
uptick because the Department of

on the rise now the Department of

the 5 million borrowers who started

defaulted by September of 2016 the
proportion of borrowers who defaulted
Prok prior to this report was 11.3% so
it increased by 0.2 percent now we've
been watching the student loan market
and we need to understand that the
government well they had to manipulate

and this is why they're working
part-time jobs this is why we're having
these kids live with their parents

it makes no sense to receive this where
